Question: My Global Workspace CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Siemens

My Global Workspace CES 2024

- Siemens unveiled innovations in immersive engineering and artificial intelligence to enable the industrial metaverse
- New partnerships and breakthroughs in AI and immersive engineering to enable the industrial metaverse
- Siemens Xcelerator open digital business platform empowering innovators
- Siemens & Sony partnership to introduce a new solution combining Siemens Xcelerator with Sony’s spatial content creation system
- Siemens’ NX™ Immersive Designer, an integrated solution combining Siemens’ NX software and Sony technology
- Siemens and Amazon Web Services (AWS) strengthening their partnership to democratize generative artificial intelligence (AI) applications
- Siemens Xcelerator Developer Experience, presenting opportunities for customers, partners, and developers
- Siemens AG is a leading technology company focused on industry, infrastructure, transport, and healthcare
